name: Kaeya
title: Frostwind Swordsman
description: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo> to opponents in front of Kaeya.
description.2: Kaeya seems affable, but his nature is that of unyielding ice.

description.0: Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him.
description.1: These icicles will follow the character around and deal <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo> to opponents in their path for the ability's duration.
description.3: A winsome smile, genial words, and the merciless hoarfrost that lies beneath... These are all Kaeya's weapons.

description.0: Every hit with Frostgnaw regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.
Opponents Frozen by Frostgnaw will drop additional Elemental Particles.
description.1: Frostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

description.0: Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
description.1: Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

description.0: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by <cryo>Cryo</cryo> is increased by 15%.
While Glacial Waltz is in effect, for each opponent defeated, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
description.1: Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
description.2: This shield absorbs <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo> with 250% efficiency.

description.0: Increases the Level of Glacial Waltz by 3.
Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.
